channel.title: cps-sec on Daniele Antonioli
channel.description: Recent content in cps-sec on Daniele Antonioli

item.title: CFP: Cyber-Physical System SECurity (CPS-SEC) Workshop 2019
item.description: Recently, I’ve accepted the invitation to join the IEEE CPS-SEC workshop TPC. CPS-SEC is co-located with the IEEE CNS conference . From the official website: The IEEE International Workshop on Cyber-Physical Systems Security (CPS-Sec) will be held in conjunction with the IEEE Conference on Communications and Network Security (CNS) 2019 in Washington, D.C., USA, on 10-12 June, 2019. Nowadays, the correct functioning of information systems represents a fundamental milestone for the well-being of modern economies and societies.
